mapper.select: SELECT payment_account_id, payment_id, com_account_id, payment_bank, payment_status, total_com_pay_amount, total_emp_pay_amount, is_active, created_time, modified_time, created_by, modified_by FROM hf_payment_account SPC WHERE SPC.is_active = '1' AND SPC.payment_id = #{paymentId}

SELECT hca.hf_account_type, hpc.com_account_id, hpc.com_account_class_id, hcac.hf_com_account, hcac.hf_type, hpc.payment_month FROM hf_payment_account hpc INNER JOIN hf_com_account hca ON hca.com_account_id = hpc.com_account_id AND hca.is_active = 1 INNER JOIN hf_com_account_class hcac ON hpc.com_account_class_id = hcac.com_account_class_id WHERE hpc.is_active = 1 AND hpc.payment_id = #{paymentId}
